--- select_singer_with_full_join.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers AS A,
  Singers AS B

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:    11,
      Source: &parser.Join{
        Op:     ",",
        Method: "",
        Hint:   (*parser.Hint)(nil),
        Left:   &parser.TableName{
          Table: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  18,
            end:  25,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &parser.AsAlias{
            pos:   26,
            Alias: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  29,
              end:  30,
              Name: "A",
            },
          },
          Sample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
        Right: &parser.TableName{
          Table: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  34,
            end:  41,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &parser.AsAlias{
            pos:   42,
            Alias: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  45,
              end:  46,
              Name: "B",
            },
          },
          Sample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
        Cond: nil,
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS A, Singers AS B
